thread.title: New mammogram guidelines reignite debate over when to test
thread.title_full: New mammogram guidelines reignite debate over when to test - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Victoria Colliver
title: New mammogram guidelines reignite debate over when to test
text:
Photo: Leah Millis, The Chronicle Karuna Jaggar, Executive Director of Breast Cancer Action pictured in her office Oct. 20, 2015 in San Francisco, Calif. Karuna Jaggar, Executive Director of Breast Cancer Action pictured...
The American Cancer Society reignited the debate Tuesday over whether routine mammograms save lives or cause more harm than good, releasing new guidelines that push back the recommended age for regular breast cancer screenings. Karuna Jaggar, Executive Director of Breast Cancer Action pictured in her office Oct. 20, 2015 in San Francisco, Calif. Karuna Jaggar, Executive Director of Breast Cancer Action pictured...
The American Cancer Society reignited the debate Tuesday over whether routine mammograms save lives or cause more harm than good, releasing new guidelines that push back the recommended age for regular breast cancer screenings.
